name: sde_graphql_lab_x
description: Service Design and Engineering GraphQL laboratory x

scripts.app: npx ts-node-dev --prefer-ts true --no-notify --rs --clear --exit-child -r tsconfig-paths/register --watch src --respawn --transpile-only src/app.ts
